overview:
Brandon Calley is responsible for Reputation.com’s business-to-business (B2B) outbound sales. He has a decade of experience in building and managing first-rate teams in the SaaS arena. Calley has built a sustainable revenue stream from B2B sales at Reputation.com that did not exist before his arrival. Prior to joining Reputation.com he developed the Go-to-market strategy for two different divisions of the Meltwater Group, a 1,000 SaaS company, where he served as a Managing Director. There he built successful teams on both US coast’s and the UK. Brandon started his career with the Fortune 500, Ricoh, before focusing his energy on sales and strategy roles within the start-up community.

Calley has a Bachelor of Science in Marketing from Oakland University in Michigan, and has completed Executive Education programs with Said Business School, Oxford University & Stanford Graduate School of Business.
